wiki.text:
'Pierre Dolbeault' (born 1924) is a French mathematician.

He studied with Henri Cartan and graduated in 1944 from the École Normale
Supérieure. He taught in the 1950s in Montpellier and Bordeaux and later at the
Université Pierre et Marie Curie (Jussieu). With Pierre Lelong and Henri Skoda
he held an Analysis seminar in Paris

The Dolbeault cohomology is named after him, and so is the Dolbeault theorem.
wiki.title: Pierre%20Dolbeault
